## Table of Contents

### Classes

* [`profile_xfs_quota`](#profile_xfs_quota): Creates a xfs_quota bash script in /etc/telegraf/scripts, and a conf file to run it

## Classes

### <a name="profile_xfs_quota"></a>`profile_xfs_quota`

Creates a xfs_quota bash script in /etc/telegraf/scripts, and a conf file to run it

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include profile_xfs_quota
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `profile_xfs_quota` class:

* [`enable`](#enable)
* [`sudo_cfg`](#sudo_cfg)
* [`volume_path`](#volume_path)

##### <a name="enable"></a>`enable`

Data type: `Boolean`

Enables the xfs quota checks

##### <a name="sudo_cfg"></a>`sudo_cfg`

Data type: `String`

Configures proper sudo access for telegraf to run the script

##### <a name="volume_path"></a>`volume_path`

Data type: `String`

Specifies the path of the xfs volume
